definitions.definition: The main business part of a city or town, usually located at or near its center.
Of, relating to, or situated in the central business district
definitions.example: John walked every day to his downtown job.

definitions.definition: In or towards the central business district
definitions.example: You need to go downtown four blocks.

definitions.definition: Outside the three-point line, or generally far from the basket.
definitions.example: That shot came from way downtown!
